### 3. API ç«¯ç‚¹é¡µé¢

```tsx title="components/api-endpoint.tsx"
import { MethodLabel } from "@/components/pivot/method-label";
import { StatusCode } from "@/components/pivot/status-code";
import { CopyButton } from "@/components/pivot/copy-button";
import { ParametersSection } from "@/components/pivot/parameters-section";
import { ResponsesSection } from "@/components/pivot/responses-section";
import { TryItOutPanel } from "@/components/pivot/try-it-out-panel";

interface ApiEndpointProps {
  method: "GET" | "POST" | "PUT" | "DELETE" | "PATCH";
  path: string;
  summary: string;
  description?: string;
  parameters?: any[];
  responses?: any[];
}

export function ApiEndpoint({
  method,
  path,
  summary,
  description,
  parameters = [],
  responses = [],
}: ApiEndpointProps) {
  return (
    <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto p-6 space-y-8">
      {/* ç«¯ç‚¹æ ‡é¢˜ */}
      <div className="space-y-4">
        <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
          <MethodLabel method={method} />
          <code className="text-lg font-mono">{path}</code>
          <CopyButton text={path} size="sm" />
        </div>

        <div>
          <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">{summary}</h1>
          {description && (
            <p className="text-muted-foreground mt-2">{description}</p>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* å‚æ•°éƒ¨åˆ† */}
      {parameters.length > 0 && <ParametersSection parameters={parameters} />}

      {/* å“åº”éƒ¨åˆ† */}
      {responses.length > 0 && <ResponsesSection responses={responses} />}

      {/* åœ¨çº¿æµ‹è¯• */}
      <TryItOutPanel method={method} path={path} parameters={parameters} />
    </div>
  );
}
```

### å®Œæ•´çš„ API æ–‡æ¡£é¡µé¢

```tsx title="pages/api/users.tsx"
import { ApiDocsLayout } from "@/components/api-docs-layout";
import { ApiEndpoint } from "@/components/api-endpoint";

export default function UsersApiPage() {
  const getUsersEndpoint = {
    method: "GET" as const,
    path: "/api/users",
    summary: "è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨",
    description: "è·å–ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­æ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·çš„åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œæ”¯æŒåˆ†é¡µå’Œè¿‡æ»¤ã€‚",
    parameters: [
      {
        name: "page",
        in: "query",
        type: "integer",
        description: "é¡µç ï¼Œä» 1 å¼€å§‹",
        default: 1,
      },
      {
        name: "limit",
        in: "query",
        type: "integer",
        description: "æ¯é¡µè¿”å›çš„ç”¨æˆ·æ•°é‡",
        default: 20,
      },
      {
        name: "search",
        in: "query",
        type: "string",
        description: "æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯ï¼Œæ”¯æŒç”¨æˆ·åå’Œé‚®ç®±æœç´¢",
      },
    ],
    responses: [
      {
        status: 200,
        description: "æˆåŠŸè¿”å›ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨",
        schema: {
          type: "object",
          properties: {
            users: {
              type: "array",
              items: {
                type: "object",
                properties: {
                  id: { type: "integer" },
                  username: { type: "string" },
                  email: { type: "string" },
                  created_at: { type: "string", format: "date-time" },
                },
              },
            },
            pagination: {
              type: "object",
              properties: {
                page: { type: "integer" },
                limit: { type: "integer" },
                total: { type: "integer" },
                pages: { type: "integer" },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      {
        status: 400,
        description: "è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯",
      },
      {
        status: 500,
        description: "æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯",
      },
    ],
  };

  return (
    <ApiDocsLayout>
      <ApiEndpoint {...getUsersEndpoint} />
    </ApiDocsLayout>
  );
}
```

### å¤šç«¯ç‚¹é¡µé¢

```tsx title="components/api-section.tsx"
import { MethodLabel } from "@/components/pivot/method-label";
import { StatusCode } from "@/components/pivot/status-code";

interface ApiSectionProps {
  title: string;
  description?: string;
  endpoints: Array<{
    method: string;
    path: string;
    summary: string;
    href: string;
  }>;
}

export function ApiSection({ title, description, endpoints }: ApiSectionProps) {
  return (
    <div className="space-y-6">
      <div>
        <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold">{title}</h2>
        {description && (
          <p className="text-muted-foreground mt-1">{description}</p>
        )}
      </div>

      <div className="space-y-2">
        {endpoints.map((endpoint, index) => (
          <a
            key={index}
            href={endpoint.href}
            className="flex items-center gap-3 p-3 rounded-lg border hover:bg-muted/50 transition-colors"
          >
            <MethodLabel method={endpoint.method as any} />
            <code className="text-sm font-mono">{endpoint.path}</code>
            <span className="text-sm text-muted-foreground flex-1">
              {endpoint.summary}
            </span>
          </a>
        ))}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```
